actions.recommendation: Prediabetes - please do a glucose tolerance test with treating GP. Lifestyle changes required - improve diet, move more. Dietician &Biokineticist can assist.
Annual mammograms and pap smears are important to keep up with - try your best to do so
Hearing - Left Ear - mild component at 4000Hz. Please monitor hearing every 6 months to annually.
Your liver enzymes are only slightly elevated, repeating this blood test with your treating doctor will help determine if they were only transiently elevated or persistently so.
